<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>requested_allocation</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition table="requested_allocation">start_dateVALCHANGES^ORend_dateVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="start_date" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/> <item endquery="false" field="end_date" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="true" value=""/> <item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/> </filter_condition> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Prevent overlapping allocations</name> <order>50</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
if(current.start_date > current .end_date){ gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage('Requested allocation start date should be before end date')); current.setAbortAction(true); }
var ga = new GlideAggregate('requested_allocation'); ga.addQuery('resource_plan', current.getValue('resource_plan')); ga.addQuery('start_date', '<=', current.end_date); ga.addQuery('end_date', '>=', current.start_date); if (current.operation() == 'update') ga.addQuery('sys_id', '!=', current.getValue('sys_id')); ga.addAggregate('COUNT'); ga.query();
var overlappingAllocations = 0; if(ga.next()) overlappingAllocations = ga.getAggregate('COUNT');
if (overlappingAllocations > 0) { gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage('Requested allocations cannot overlap with another')); current.setAbortAction(true); }
})(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2016-05-09 10:25:17</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>272902d99357120064f572edb67ffb98</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Prevent overlapping allocations</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Resource Management" source="com.snc.resource_management">7200da2b47e64210cd4e1ce4316d438e</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_272902d99357120064f572edb67ffb98</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-12-04 09:08:26</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=272902d99357120064f572edb67ffb98"/> </record_update>
